name: Ganyu
storytext: "This press release is due tomorrow... I suppose I could work through the night and get it done."
source: Reward for inviting Ganyu to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Trail of the Qilin
skills.description: Deals 1 Cryo DMG, creates 1 Ice Lotus.

skills.name: Frostflake Arrow
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], deals 2 $[K5] to all opposing characters on standby.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>, deals 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters on standby.
skills.description: Deals 2 Cryo DMG, deals 2 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby.

skills.name: Celestial Shower
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], deals 1 $[K5] to all opposing characters on standby, summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111011]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>, deals 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters on standby, summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sacred Cryo Pearl</color>.
skills.description: Deals 2 Cryo DMG, deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby, summons 1 Sacred Cryo Pearl.
